input2: HPI: He is a male who was found to have a sellar mass when a CT scan was done after he fell on ice and snow. A subsequent  MRI of the sella at OSH showed a 1.8 x 2.7 x 1.8 cm mass in the pituitary gland, extending superiorly and also laterally.
